/a.js(2,1): error TS1203: Export assignment cannot be used when targeting ECMAScript modules. Consider using 'export default' or another module format instead.


==== /a.js (1 errors) ====
    const alias = {};
    module.exports = alias;
    ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
!!! error TS1203: Export assignment cannot be used when targeting ECMAScript modules. Consider using 'export default' or another module format instead.
    
==== /b.js (0 errors) ====
    import a from "./a";
